sections.summary:
Accountable Retail Sales Associate demonstrating a high level of ownership and initiative. Possessing 2 years small management experience. Quick
and effective at decision making, while maintaining excellent customer service throughout the sales process in any given enviornment.
Highlights
6 years Customer Service Experience
Â Intermediate Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, etc.)
Â Outstanding communicational and operational skills
Â Proven ability to multi-task
Â Ambitious, Positive, Enthusiastic
Punctual and Reliable
Accomplishments
Fulfilled all supervisory duties when / if Store Manager was unable to make it into our store, whilst training a new employee at our store location
for 6 months.
Lead sales by example when employees quit or called off, earning myself the sales lead position likewise as attaining the ability to open and closer
the store with proven responsibility and punctuality.
